Package gov.nasa.jpl.aerie.merlin.protocol.model

Interface Task<Return>

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
public interface Task<Return> extends AutoCloseable

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    close()
     
    void
    reset()
    Reset this task to its state before step(Scheduler) was ever called.
    TaskStatus<Return>
    step(Scheduler scheduler)
    Perform one step of the task, returning the conditions under which to progress to the next step.

  • Method Details

    • step

      TaskStatus<Return> step(Scheduler scheduler)
      Perform one step of the task, returning the conditions under which to progress to the next step. If this method returns TaskStatus.Completed, then any system resources held must be released. See reset() for more details on resource management.

    • reset

      void reset()
      Reset this task to its state before step(Scheduler) was ever called. Any system resources held must be released by this method, so that garbage collection can take care of the rest. For instance, if this object makes use of an OS-level Thread, that thread must be explicitly released to avoid resource leaks.

    • close

      default void close()
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
